body_html:
@gunan, the issue is still there. There a patch applied to workaround it, but I'm just saying that you may want to keep the issue open until a proper solution is possible with bazel.
See a line in workspace.bzl which applies the patch and the patch itself.

@gunan, the issue is still there. There a patch applied to workaround it, but I'm just saying that you may want to keep the issue open until a proper solution is possible with bazel.
See a line in workspace.bzl which applies the patch  and the patch itself.
body:
@gunan, the issue is still there. There a patch applied to workaround it, but I'm just saying that you may want to keep the issue open until a proper solution is possible with bazel.
See [a line in workspace.bzl which applies the patch](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/workspace.bzl#L314)  and [the patch itself](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/third_party/protobuf/add_noinlines.patch).
